metadata.title: VibeDev ID - Vibe Coding Community #1 in Indonesia | AI-Powered Coding
metadata.description: Join VibeDev ID, Indonesia's vibe coding community. Learn AI-powered coding, collaborate on open source projects, and meet fellow vibe coders. Weekly events + community support.
metadata.ogTitle: VibeDev ID - Vibe Coding Community #1 in Indonesia
metadata.ogDescription: Indonesia's vibe coding community: learn AI-powered coding, open source projects, weekly events.
metadata.twitterDescription: Learn AI-powered coding with Indonesia's vibe coding community.

hero.subtitle: Indonesia's vibe coding community for those who want to level up, learn AI-powered coding, collaborate on open source projects, and join weekly sharing sessions.
